description.value: A ninja who selects this ninja trick gains the @Compendium[pf1.feats.bHcqTC4Lf3aVl3VO]{Snatch Arrows} feat as a bonus feat. The ninja must have the @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{Improved Unarmed Strike} feat and the @Compendium[pf1.feats.ACEQfonKVqh0fwkK]{Deflect Arrows} feat before taking this trick.
